description:
In Santa Barbara, California, for legal representation regarding matters of personal injury, citizens rely on the qualified attorneys at The May Firm. With a commitment to always advocate for the injured party rather than the insurance company, we have recovered millions of dollars for our clients during our tenure as qualified injury attorneys.

The law firm’s practice areas include car accidents, wrongful death, motorcycle accidents, truck accidents, dog bites and slip and falls. We also extend our services to those in the following areas: San Luis Obispo, Santa Maria, Ventura, Fresno, Bakersfield and San Diego. Combine free initial consultations with our willingness to take credit card payments for services, and our clients get affordable, skilled representation when they are injured by the negligence of another. 

With an A+ rating from the Better Business Bureau and an Avvo “Superb” rating from our clients, our law firm is listed in the ranks of The National Trial Lawyers Top 40 Under 40, the Million Dollar Advocates Forum, and the National Academy of Personal Injury Attorneys. For our focus on client satisfaction, The May Firm has also been included in the list of the 10 Best under 40 attorneys by the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys.

We have also successfully handled cases of vehicle rollovers, burn injuries, train accidents, boating accidents, brain injuries, spinal cord injuries and public transportation accidents. Several wrongful death cases have resulted in judgments of over $1.8 million for our clients. As experienced defense attorneys, the team at our law firm understands how personal injuries can affect the livelihood, interests and quality of life of the injured.
